Text:
GREAT UPLOAD 

i just made an account just to thank you !

ThĂŠ only problem i have is that the mouse doesn't run smoothly when there are no guards 

Maybe its because of my Macbook but i doubt it :)
Hey thanks, hope you like it. :)

hey! I have the following problem: after the 2 pre-title credits of the delevopers etc. I get a black screen, with some ambient music (normally backing the menu I suppose). I tried with several screen resolutions in the pre-game menu, same result. has anybody any suggestions what might cause this, or rather how to fix it? 
in any case many thanks to Poeticile for efforts and generosity!

I'm running a macbook OS 10.5; 4 GB RAM, 2,2GHz.

on the black screen there's no reaction to any keys, save the power button, with which I always have to force a shutdown/restart.
@ Baudelaire ~ Try installing 10.6 first, or at least the most recent one. If you can, that is.

thank you so much nice game even is a bit old but the graphics stunning and the story , im now at the butcher-crypt and after the movie the game crash like dont have to continue , should i have to search for the contunue or is just a mistake from my mac, i use imac i5 and 10.6.6, any issue about this ?
thanks anyway

...actually i passed in to the crypt without kill none and the system didnt accept me so this was the reason that didnt load the ctypt ,i killed all of them and the system left me continue 
thanks again this is very nice game :)
i have 10.0.6 with 256mb graphic card....so will it work man??

Hello
Great game, excellent port. Thanks!
I've only got one problem, the mouse isn't responsive sometimes. I'm running a MacBook Pro, last year's edition. Can you help? Thanks.
i hate this port its loading for 10h wtf

Hi, I'm having a problem with this game and since I couldn't find the solution on the internet thought I would ask here :) Whenever I enter Morphine Mode the screen just goes all red and all I can see is the hospital gown. Does anyone else have this problem and better yet does anyone know how to fix it... Thanks :-)
